Every day you open up Discover Square, you'll see new photos from your closest friends, and creative people from around the world.Features:â¢ Share photos only with people you want with easy privacy settingsâ¢ Add new people to group or simply make the group public for the world to seeâ¢ Upload your photos to share straight from Android deviceâ¢ Sign up directly from the app or login if you already have an accountâ¢ Full screen photo browsing and slideshows for your pictures inside any groupâ¢ Instant sharing to Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Email client, and Google Voiceâ¢ Instant Messaging is another of sharing thoughts on a photo or inside groupsGroup Photo Sharing has never been easier, try Discover Square today, and it's free!
